name: razor-shell
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
